short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight Words, abbreviated HL, Custom highlighting the text you specify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A highlight text plugin (Highlight Words:HL, abbreviated HL) that allows you to customize the text you want to highlight, including the color of the text and the background color of the highlight. It also supports highlight range configuration, and import/export of configurations.
